Title: Increases protection against retaliation for public employees and provides an affirmative defense
Summary: Increases protection against retaliation for public employees who fail to perform a duty when such action is deemed improper by any group, person, body, organization, legislative representative or social networking platform and provides for an affirmative defense.
LawCode: Amd ยง75-b, Civ Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the civil service law, in relation to increasing protection against retaliation for public employees and provides an affirmative defense
